name: Drain the Sea
description:
The ice caps have melted and the world is flooded! Our only hope is to drill a hole into the crust to drain the sea. Reach a depth of 5km to win. Some people are skeptical of the plan. Stop drilling and you might lose support and get canned.

Forgot to put these in the how to: 

You get $25 per surplus person every 5 seconds.

If you delete a improvement you get back 50% the cost.
